title: BookMyShow
description: Developed a RESTful application with APIs for User, Movie, Reviews, Show, Show Seats, Cinema, Cinema Hall, Search, and Booking management.
Implemented authentication and security using Spring Security, JWT, and BCrypt for enhanced protection.
Created two microservices: Review Service for movie reviews and Global Search Service using Elasticsearch for advanced search.
Integrated services using Kafka to connect the Review Service, Global Search Service, and BookMyShow seamlessly.

title: Elektu
description: The user can access the bicycle through multiple options such as Bluetooth, QR Code, Fingerprint sensor and the mobile application (Android App).
Consist Firebase Database, User verification using OTP.

title: Portfolio
description: Developed a dynamic portfolio website using React for an interactive and responsive UI.
Styled the website with CSS, ensuring a visually appealing and user-friendly design.
Utilized JSON for structured data management, enabling seamless content updates.
